entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
